 Login character list. This points to the character list.
static uint LoginSelectedChar = 0x76C288
 Login character list selected character. This address doesn't move.
static uint PointerToGameWindowRect = 0x0012D624
 Pointer to an address. When that address has 0x4E added to it, it points to the game window rect struct.

Detailed Description

Client addresses not specific to a player.

Pointer to an address. When that address has 0x4E added to it, it points to the game window rect struct.
